main event: An unidentified luminous object was reported near Tehran, Iran, on 25 June 1957, by Iranian Air Force personnel.
interesting points: The object was described as a round, brilliant white light larger than a star and brighter than Venus., Upon attempting to intercept the object, the lead pilot's aircraft experienced a malfunction., The object emitted rays of colored lights and changed colors rapidly., The object accelerated out of sight at a tremendous speed., Maintenance checks revealed no mechanical defects in the F-86 aircraft after the incident.
witness description: Iranian Air Force personnel and military officers on the ground
